Transfer_Pricing_Rate_SheetObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Transfer_Pricing_Rate_SheetObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Transfer_Pricing_Rate_SheetObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Contains transfer pricing rate sheet instances.

Transfer_Pricing_Rate_Sheet_Data.description: ID of the transfer pricing rate sheet.
The unique name of the transfer pricing rate sheet.

CurrencyObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

CurrencyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

CurrencyObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Transfer_Pricing_Rate_Sheet_Data.description: The currency for this transfer pricing rate sheet. Required for the Put web service.

Transfer_Pricing_Rate_Sheet_Snapshot_Dat.description: Retrieves or submits the default rate or percent of transfer pricing. If the transfer pricing rate basis is selected as custom rate, it is the default rate; otherwise, it is the default percent.

Unique_IdentifierObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Unique_IdentifierObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Unique_IdentifierObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Transfer_Pricing_Rate_Sheet_Snapshot_Dat.description: Contains the transfer pricing rate basis, comprised of either the Custom Rate or the Standard Cost Rate Sheet. Required for the Put web service.

Project_Cost_Rate_RuleObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Project_Cost_Rate_RuleObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Project_Cost_Rate_RuleObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Transfer_Pricing_Rate_Sheet_Detail_Data.description: Retrieves or submits the hourly rate for transfer pricing cost.
Retrieves or submits the percentage associated with the transfer pricing cost.

Unique_IdentifierObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Unique_IdentifierObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Unique_IdentifierObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Transfer_Pricing_Rate_Sheet_Detail_Data.description: Contains the transfer pricing rate basis, comprised of either the Custom Rate or the Standard Cost Rate Sheet. Required for the Put web service.

Transfer_Pricing_Rate_Sheet_Snapshot_Dat.description: Contains the transfer pricing rate sheet details data.

validation.validation: When Transfer Pricing Rate Basis for detail is Standard Cost Rate Sheet, Transfer Pricing Cost Hourly Rate for detail is not required and must be zero.
The Delete option should be set to false since Transfer Pricing Rate Sheet Detail ID does not exist.
Enter a unique project cost rate rule. This project cost rate rule already exists for the Transfer Pricing Rate Sheet Snapshot instance.
This Transfer Pricing Rate Sheet Detail ID has already been used for other snapshot.
When Transfer Pricing Rate Basis for detail is Custom Rate, Transfer Pricing Cost Percent for detail is not required and must be zero.
Enter a unique project cost rate rule.  This project cost rate rule already exists for the Transfer Rate Sheet Snapshot in the coming web service request element.

Transfer_Pricing_Rate_Sheet_Data.description: Contains the snapshot of the transfer pricing rate sheet data.

description: Contains transfer pricing rate sheet data.

validation.validation: You cannot change the currency of the existing rate sheet.
